Annotation: PoS tagging, Named Entity recognition, sentiment analysis
Description: This corpus contains Tweets.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.

Language: Albanian, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Croatian, English, German, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish
Description: This corpus contains Tweet IDs with sentiment annotations.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.

Corpus: Dataset and baseline model of moderated content FRENK-STYRIA-24sata 1.0
Description: This corpus contains news comments from the website 24sata.hr.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from CLARIN.SI.

Corpus: Aspect-Term Annotated Customer Reviews in Czech
Description: This corpus contains online user-product reviews.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from LINDAT.
This corpus contains Facebook posts.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from LINDAT and through the concordancer KonText.

This corpus contains sentences from Finnish social media that have been manually annotated for sentiment polarity by three native annotators.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from META-SHARE (the Finnish Language Bank).
This corpus contains reviews in different domains (e.g., literature, videogames, etc.).#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARINO repository.

Corpus: Manually sentiment annotated Slovenian news corpus SentiNews 1.0
Description: This corpus contains news articles.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.
This is a data set of Portuguese tweets labeled with the emotion conveyed in the tweet. Each tweet is labelled with an emotion (anger, fear, joy, sadness).
